name: Small Racer
description:
A prototype made during a weekend. There's a chance I might keep working on this game.

Graphics, programming and audio by APirateHat

Known Problems

Yes, I know it's possible to cheat.

Some text cover the tracks if you don't play in fullscreen, it's because I'm a dum-dum with resolutions and export settings. 

Changing the project to WebGL messed up the colors. Nothing game breaking but annoying for me personally.
